Html:
Hi,

I recently found GMap.NET and decided to try using it. However, none of the projects build. It consistently says "Skipped <operation>" whether the <operation> is Build, Rebuild or Clean; I tried this for individual projects and for the solution.

I took the following steps before build:

1. Checked out the latest source using the https link to the mercurial repo. (It's timestamped May 4, 2011). 

2. Hit "Cancel" on the password request for strong name key store.

3. Set active solution platform to x86 

4. Removed the "GMap.NET - Hot Build" project (based on the discussion - http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/237244)

5. Ensured that the *.WindowsMobile projects were not built on x86 platform.

 

Please let me know how to resolve this issue. Thanks!

Hi again,

Turns out the previous posting was a waste!

I changed the "Target .NET Framework" from .NET 2.0 to .NET 3.5 and the build worked with a few warnings.
